      • put

        public void put(java.lang.String assetId,
                com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode data)
        Description copied from interface: Ledger
        Creates/Appends an Asset entry to the ledger. The initial entry is marked as age 0 and new entry is appended with an incremented age.
        Specified by:
        put in interface Ledger<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>
        Parameters:
        assetId - an asset ID to create/append
        data - asset data
